page.title: 10Leisure In South Clifton 2
page.content: If people wish to go swimming they have to travel to either The North Kesteven Pool,North Hykeham or Gainsborough Pool.Once again they have to provide their own transport.Men and boys can be found on the banks of the Trent indulging in their hobby of fishing.In the season there is also a large amount of game shooting and hunting.The local Public House in South Clifton boasts a darts team which plays in the local league.It is also a meeting place for the villagers to chat over a glass of beer. A mobile library provided by Notts CC visits the village once a fortnight which is well patronised.Many people spend time in gardening,both vegetables and flowers.A Produce Show is held in August to encourage this.Other hobbies include restoring old cars,spinning, steamengines and choral singing.
